name: Entrepreneurship Skills Offline
description: With this App you dont need internet connection to read about entrepreneurship skills concept.   This tutorial will give anyone who is interested in learning entrepreneurship skills all he need to become expert in entrepreneurship skills for free.  If you are student who is preparing for exams about entrepreneurship skills or person how looking to be entrepreneur, this app is maid for you   The tutorial lessons are divided into comprehensive sections for fast and easy learning.  No prior programming experience is needed even a beginner can learn entrepreneurship skills easily.  Currently, we are covering following all this topics:  entrepreneurship skills - Overview entrepreneurship skills - Introduction entrepreneurship skills - Types of Entrepreneurs entrepreneurship skills - Roles of an Entrepreneur entrepreneurship skills - Entrepreneurial Motivations entrepreneurship skills - Goal-setting Strategies entrepreneurship skills - Creating a Productivity Journal entrepreneurship skills - How to be a True Entrepreneur entrepreneurship skills - Effective Communication
